description:
Baby weaning is an exciting time for any parent, but can also be a very anxious time with lots of questions.

This app aims to help with any questions you have regarding weaning and should set you off in the right direction.

Baby Weaning has the following features:

- Tips on weaning, including when to start weaning your baby and what foods to give at each stage

- Many recipes for stage 1, 2 and 3 of weaning

- Food A – Z list which gives specific details about the food, such as when the food should be introduced, what are the health benefits of the food and how you should prepare it

- Favourites screen where you can store your favourite recipes for a quick reference guide

Please let us know by email at support@clevermatrix.co.uk if there is anything you would like adding to future updates and we'll see what we can do.
